name: Flight Or Flight - Fall 2018 - 470
description:
Game Description:

Choose your role of the survivor or the dark entity. You as the survivor have wandered into an abandoned high school with a dark entity lurking in the corner. There is only 1 way to escape, find the key to the EXIT and get out of there before the dark entity kills you. You as the dark entity must catch and kill the survivor in order to win.
